query:
SELECT DISTINCT RECIPENAME, INGREDIENTNAME, ZAMOUNT, UNITID, UNITNAME
FROM
(SELECT Z_PK AS RECIPEID, ZNAME AS RECIPENAME, ZINGREDIENT, ZUNIT, ZAMOUNT
FROM ZRECIPE JOIN (SELECT Z_PK AS PRIMARYKEY, ZRECIPE, ZINGREDIENT, ZUNIT, ZAMOUNT FROM ZRECIPEINGREDIENT)
WHERE RECIPEID = ZRECIPE),
(SELECT Z_PK AS INGREDIENTID, ZNAME AS INGREDIENTNAME, ZRECIPE
FROM ZINGREDIENT JOIN (SELECT Z_PK AS PRIMARYKEY, ZRECIPE, ZINGREDIENT FROM ZRECIPEINGREDIENT)
WHERE INGREDIENTID = ZINGREDIENT),
(SELECT Z_PK AS UNITID, ZNAME AS UNITNAME FROM ZUNIT)
WHERE ZINGREDIENT = INGREDIENTiD AND ZRECIPE = RECIPEID AND UNITID = ZUNIT
